mappingFixedLengthToLData(Object, String) - Static method in class devonx.finast.util.LDataConvertUtil
표준전문구조->LData 사용예)
String bodyMessage = "aa bb 0000000000000000000";

String specId="AcctRetrieveXF_O";

LData result = LDataConvertUtil.mappingFixedLengthToLData(bodyMessage,specId);

[return]
LData의 결과 KEY | VALUE ------------------------------------------------------------- acctNo |aa acctAlias |bb balance |0 balance2 |0.00 -------------------------------------------------------------
mappingLDataToFixedLength(LData, String) - Static method in class devonx.finast.util.LDataConvertUtil
LData -> 표준전문구조 사용예)
LData bodyMessage = new LData();
bodyMessage.setString("acctNo","abc"); bodyMessage.setString("acctAlias","bb");
String specId="AcctRetrieveXF_O";

String result = LDataConvertUtil.mappingLDataToFixedLength(bodyMessage,specId);

[return]
String타입 : abc bb 0000000000000000000
